en.title: "Hope For Children" Activities in Philippines!
en.content:
REPORT ON SOCIAL ENTREPRENEURSHIP ACTIVITY OF FE PHILIPPINES INITIATED 
BY COUNTRY LICENSEE JEREMY LOOI. 
 
On early morning of Friday 29 May, three days before school reopens in the Philippines, Jeremy Looi 
fulfilled his social entrepreneurial passion with FE Endorser and Executive Director Samboy Lim and Presidential Director Pastor Art Medina at the Lighthouse Centre For Children in Payatas.
FE Executive Director Samboy Lim showing one of his many skills and entertained the children 
with a couple of magic tricks to their delight.
Distributing valuable school supplies to an initial 30 elementary students of Praise Emerald International School (founded by the late Judge Lorenzo Veneracion). Both Pastor Athur Medina and Philippines CL Jeremy Looi (along with many fellow FE distributors) had vowed to continue the social entrepreneur legacy started by the late Presidential Director Judge Lorenzo Veneracion.

meta.description: FusionExcel's Leaders launched social entrepreneurship activities in Payatas on 29 May.
